client.ClientViews

Class OrderView

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.ClientViews.OrderView

  • class OrderView
extends java.lang.Object
    Order view displays the orders of the shop.
    Since:
    April 5, 2019
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jake Liu, Shamez Meghji, Victor Sanchez

    • Field Summary

      Button to "turn off" (visibility of) the window.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void addCloseButtonListener()
      Adds an anonymous inner class ActionListener to the close buttons of the order window, in order to set off visibility.

      Create the panel for the buttons to close the window.

      Create the panel to display the order information.

      • setWindowVisibility

        protected void setWindowVisibility(boolean visibility)
        Set the visibility of the Order window.
        Parameters:
        visibility - True if the order window should be visible, false if not.

      • addCloseButtonListener

        protected void addCloseButtonListener()
        Adds an anonymous inner class ActionListener to the close buttons of the order window, in order to set off visibility.

      • getOrderDisplay

        public javax.swing.JTextArea getOrderDisplay()
        Gets the order display text area.
        Returns:
        a text area that contains the order display.
